permissions.name: ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
permissions.description: Allows an app to access the device's location roughly (low accuracy).
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's location without their knowledge, selling the user's location data.

permissions.name: ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
permissions.description: Allows an app to access the device's location precisely (high accuracy).
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's movement in real-time, targeting the user with location-based ads.

permissions.name: ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION
permissions.description: Allows an app to access the device's location in the background.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's location without their knowledge, even when the app is not in use.

permissions.name: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
permissions.description: Allows an app to read files from the device's external storage.
permissions.misuse: Stealing the user's personal data, such as photos, videos, and documents.

permissions.name: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
permissions.description: Allows an app to write files to the device's external storage.
permissions.misuse: Spreading malware to the user's device, modifying the user's files without permission.

permissions.name: READ_CONTACTS
permissions.description: Allows an app to read the user's contact list.
permissions.misuse: Selling the user's contact data, sending spam to the user's contacts.

permissions.name: WRITE_CONTACTS
permissions.description: Allows an app to add, modify, and delete the user's contacts.
permissions.misuse: Forging the user's identity, sending spam to the user's contacts.

permissions.name: READ_PHONE_STATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to access information about the device, such as IMEI and phone number.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's device identity, stealing the user's personal information.

permissions.name: RECORD_AUDIO
permissions.description: Allows an app to record audio from the device.
permissions.misuse: Recording the user's conversations without their knowledge, selling the user's audio data.

permissions.name: CAMERA
permissions.description: Allows an app to use the device's camera.
permissions.misuse: Taking pictures or videos of the user without their knowledge, spreading private content.

permissions.name: SEND_SMS
permissions.description: Allows an app to send SMS messages.
permissions.misuse: Sending spam SMS to the user, scamming the user with SMS scams.

permissions.name: READ_SMS
permissions.description: Allows an app to read SMS messages.
permissions.misuse: Stealing personal information from the user's SMS messages, tracking the user's activity.

permissions.name: RECEIVE_SMS
permissions.description: Allows an app to receive SMS messages.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting SMS messages containing sensitive information, tracking the user's activity.

permissions.name: READ_PHONE_NUMBERS
permissions.description: Allows an app to read the device's phone number.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's device identity, stealing the user's personal information.

permissions.name: ANSWER_PHONE_CALLS
permissions.description: Allows an app to answer incoming phone calls.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting phone calls without the user's knowledge, scamming the user with phone scams.

permissions.name: READ_CELL_BROADCASTS
permissions.description: Allows an app to read cell broadcasts.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting cell broadcasts containing sensitive information, tracking the user's activity.

permissions.name: RECEIVE_MMS
permissions.description: Allows an app to receive MMS messages.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting MMS messages containing sensitive information, tracking the user's activity.

permissions.name: RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
permissions.description: Allows an app to receive WAP push messages.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting WAP push messages containing sensitive information, tracking the user's activity.

permissions.name: INTERNET
permissions.description: Allows an app to connect to the internet.
permissions.misuse: Stealing the user's personal data, transferring the user's data to third parties without permission.

permissions.name: ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to access information about the network, such as connection status and network type.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's online activity, manipulating the user's network connection.

permissions.name: BLUETOOTH
permissions.description: Allows an app to use Bluetooth.
permissions.misuse: Stealing data from other Bluetooth devices, controlling other Bluetooth devices without permission.

permissions.name: NFC
permissions.description: Allows an app to use NFC.
permissions.misuse: Stealing data from NFC cards, making payments without the user's permission, stealing data from other NFC devices, controlling other NFC devices without permission.

permissions.name: BODY_SENSORS
permissions.description: Allows an app to access body sensor data, such as heart rate and steps.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's health without their knowledge, selling the user's health data.

permissions.name: CALL_PHONE
permissions.description: Allows an app to make phone calls.
permissions.misuse: Making spam calls to the user, scamming the user with phone scams.

permissions.name: READ_CALENDAR
permissions.description: Allows an app to read events from the user's calendar.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's schedule and activities, selling the user's calendar data.

permissions.name: WRITE_CALENDAR
permissions.description: Allows an app to add, modify, and delete events from the user's calendar.
permissions.misuse: Scheduling fake events in the user's calendar, disrupting the user's productivity.

permissions.name: READ_CALL_LOG
permissions.description: Allows an app to read the user's call history.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's phone activity, selling the user's call history data.

permissions.name: USE_SIP
permissions.description: Allows an app to use VoIP (Voice over IP).
permissions.misuse: Making VoIP calls without the user's permission, charging the user for calls.

permissions.name: SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
permissions.description: Allows an app to display an overlay on top of other apps.
permissions.misuse: Displaying disruptive or harmful advertisements, mimicking other apps to deceive the user.

permissions.name: VIBRATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to vibrate the device.
permissions.misuse: Disturbing the user with unwanted vibrations, draining the device's battery.

permissions.name: WAKE_LOCK
permissions.description: Allows an app to prevent the device from going to sleep.
permissions.misuse: Draining the device's battery, disrupting the user's sleep.

permissions.name: RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
permissions.description: Allows an app to receive the ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.
permissions.misuse: Starting malicious services after the device boots, running in the background without the user's knowledge.

permissions.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE
permissions.description: Allows an app to create foreground services.
permissions.misuse: Running in the background without the user's knowledge, draining the device's battery.

permissions.name: BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
permissions.description: Allows an app to discover and pair Bluetooth devices.
permissions.misuse: Stealing data from other Bluetooth devices, controlling other Bluetooth devices without permission.

permissions.name: BLUETOOTH_SCAN
permissions.description: Allows an app to initiate a background Bluetooth scan.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's location and movement, draining the device's battery.

permissions.name: BLUETOOTH_CONNECT
permissions.description: Allows an app to connect to paired Bluetooth devices.
permissions.misuse: Stealing data from paired Bluetooth devices, controlling paired Bluetooth devices without permission.

permissions.name: CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to change Wi-Fi connectivity state.
permissions.misuse: Disconnecting the user from Wi-Fi networks, tracking the user's Wi-Fi usage.

permissions.name: ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to access information about Wi-Fi networks.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's Wi-Fi usage, manipulating the user's Wi-Fi connection.

permissions.name: CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to change network connectivity state.
permissions.misuse: Disconnecting the user from mobile networks, tracking the user's network usage.

permissions.name: CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
permissions.description: Allows an app to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting data from other devices on the same Wi-Fi network, stealing data from other devices.

permissions.name: READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
permissions.description: Allows an app to read the sync settings.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's sync settings, manipulating the user's sync settings.

permissions.name: WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
permissions.description: Allows an app to modify the sync settings.
permissions.misuse: Disabling the user's sync settings, manipulating the user's sync settings.

permissions.name: READ_SYNC_STATS
permissions.description: Allows an app to read the sync stats.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's sync activity, selling the user's sync data.

permissions.name: WRITE_SETTINGS
permissions.description: Allows an app to modify system settings.
permissions.misuse: Disabling the user's settings, manipulating the user's settings.

permissions.name: REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES
permissions.description: Allows an app to request installation packages.
permissions.misuse: Installing malware on the user's device, tricking the user into installing unwanted apps.

permissions.name: INSTALL_SHORTCUT
permissions.description: Allows an app to install a shortcut in Launcher.
permissions.misuse: Installing shortcuts to malicious websites or apps, tricking the user into installing unwanted shortcuts.

permissions.name: UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT
permissions.description: Allows an app to uninstall a shortcut in Launcher.
permissions.misuse: Removing shortcuts without the user's permission, disrupting the user's experience.

permissions.name: READ_GSERVICES
permissions.description: Allows an app to read Google service configuration data.
permissions.misuse: Tracking the user's Google service usage, selling the user's Google service data.

permissions.name: ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY
permissions.description: Allows an app to access Do Not Disturb settings.
permissions.misuse: Disabling the user's Do Not Disturb settings, manipulating the user's Do Not Disturb settings.

permissions.name: BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to an accessibility service.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting the user's accessibility events, stealing the user's accessibility data.

permissions.name: BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to a device admin.
permissions.misuse: Gaining administrative control over the user's device, locking the user out of their device.

permissions.name: BIND_DREAM_SERVICE
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to a dream service.
permissions.misuse: Running in the background without the user's knowledge, draining the device's battery.

permissions.name: BIND_INPUT_METHOD
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to an input method.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting the user's keystrokes, stealing the user's input data.

permissions.name: BIND_NFC_SERVICE
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to an NFC service.
permissions.misuse: Stealing data from NFC cards, making payments without the user's permission, stealing data from other NFC devices, controlling other NFC devices without permission.

permissions.name: BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to a notification listener service.
permissions.misuse: Intercepting the user's notifications, stealing the user's notification data.

permissions.name: BIND_PRINT_SERVICE
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to a print service.
permissions.misuse: Stealing the user's print data, manipulating the user's print settings.

permissions.name: BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE
permissions.description: Allows an app to bind to a quick settings tile.
permissions.misuse: Manipulating the user's quick settings, disrupting the user's experience.
